text.p: Fore Systems Inc said Tuesday it expects to report fourth-quarter earnings of $0.09 to $0.10 per share before a one-time litigation charge.
After the charge -- a litigation settlement of $8.25 million by Fore's ALANTEC Corp unit -- earnings will be $0.04 to $0.05 per share, the company said.
Revenues were $100-$103 million, compared with $75.3 million a year ago, Fore said.

The company also said it expects to earn $0.42-$0.43 per share for the year, on revenues of $394-$397 million. The projected results include a $27 million pre-tax charge for merger-related expenses, including the acquisition of ALANTEC, Fore said.
The company had revenues of $235 million in 1995.
Fore's fiscal fourth quarter began January 1.
In the year-ago fourth quarter Fore reported a loss of $0.22 a share, including merger expenses. It reported a profit of $0.23 a share for the previous fiscal year.
